page.title: 03A NORMAL SCHOOL WEEK,S.LEEDS
page.content: In South Leeds we have Middle Schools.This means that pupils in our school are aged between nine and thirteen.Our school is named Hugh Gaitskell Middle School who was our local MP and leader of the Labour Party in the 1950's. Morning school begins at 8.55am until 12 noon with a break of one quarter of an hour at 10.45am.Our afternoon school begins at 1.10pm.We finish school at 3.30pm.After school we have some clubs such as Drama,Football or Computer Club. Here is a list of the subjects we do at school in a normal week and the time spent doing them. {English}22% {Maths}17% {Form Time}16% {Humanities}11% {French}9% {Design}6% {Science}6% {Music}4% {Games}4% { {Physical Education}3% {Home Studies}2%
